You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Output:
final_response: Liselotte Grschebina was born on May 2, 1908, in Karlsruhe, which was then part of the German Empire. She held Israeli nationality and was a professional photographer. Grschebina passed away in Israel on June 14, 1994.
